dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3051164H] Cease and Desist - Hyatt Domain Abuse
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, February 12, 2007 8:49 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3051164H] Cease and Desist - Hyatt Domain Abuse ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Cease and Desist - Hyatt Domain Abuse Added by system at Monday, Feb 12 2007 02:47 pm X-MailFrom: Chicago.Trademarks@corphq.hyatt.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Feb 12 14:46:46 2007 Received: (qmail 15563 invoked by alias); 12 Feb 2007 20:46:46 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 15560 invoked from network); 12 Feb 2007 20:46:46 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 12 Feb 2007 20:46:46 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 12 Feb 2007 14:46:45 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 12 Feb 2007 14:46:46 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from Chicago.Trademarks@corphq.hyatt.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HGi4T-00041B-RK for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Feb 2007 14:46:45 -0600 Received: from mail5.imaphost.com ([38.100.41.81]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Chicago.Trademarks@corphq.hyatt.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HGi4Q-000Aqs-Nz for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Feb 2007 14:46:42 -0600 Received: from plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com [10.20.1.21]) by plmail5.prod.cyveillance.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 104B43542E4; Mon, 12 Feb 2007 15:46:41 -0500 (EST) Received: from plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (localhost.localdomain [127.0.0.1]) by plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (8.12.11/8.12.11) with ESMTP id l1CKkfcN017131; Mon, 12 Feb 2007 15:46:41 -0500 Date: Mon, 12 Feb 2007 15:46:41 -0500 (EST) From: Chicago.Trademarks@corphq.hyatt.com To: asd888asj8bhbhyasd676787asbdhbahsbdht767676asdbhbhasd@startseek.com Cc: abuse@theplanet.com Message-ID: <5853999.1001171313201034.JavaMail.cicusr@plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com> Subject: Cease and Desist - Hyatt Domain Abuse MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_Part_100_11244387.1171313201032" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Feb 2007 20:46:46.0074 (UTC) FILETIME=[E8EE89A0:01C74EE6] (multipart/mixed) MIME element (text/html)

2/12/2007

Dear WhoisGuard Protected ,

As you are no doubt aware, the Hyatt Corporation is the registered owner of the trademark and service mark "Hyatt".  It has been brought to Hyatt's attention that you have registered the domain name http://www.hyattsainteclaire.com/.  Your unauthorized use of such domain name constitutes willful trademark infringement and cyber piracy.  Such unauthorized use will inevitably cause confusion of the public and dilute and tarnish the value of this mark.

We hereby demand that you (1) immediately cease and desist from all infringing uses of the "Hyatt" mark; and (2) reply to this email with confirmation that you will make no such use of the "Hyatt" mark in the future.  Please let us have your response via email confirmation within the next ten (10) days in order to avoid further escalation of this matter.

Nothing in this letter shall be deemed a waiver of any rights or remedies of Hyatt, all of which are expressly reserved.

Sincerely,

The Hyatt Corporation

Ref: 1.5.33  http://www.hyattsainteclaire.com/

MIME element (text/plain)
